[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [CopyrightElementHandler](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.md)

## CopyrightElementHandler class

Helper class that maintains up-to-date \[\[MapView\]\] copyright information in DOM element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CopyrightElementHandler 
```

## Example

// HTML snippet <div id="copyrightNotice" style="position:absolute; right:0; bottom:0; z-index:100"></div>

// JavaScript const mapView = new MapView(<!-- -->{ ... }<!-- -->); CopyrightElementHandler.install("copyrightNotice", mapView);

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(element, mapView)](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new <code>CopyrightElementHandler</code> that updates the DOM element with the copyright info of the given <code>mapView</code>.<!-- -->Note: Generally, the static \[\[install\]\] method can be used to create and attach a new <code>CopyrightElementHandler</code> to a \[\[MapView\]\] |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [staticInfo](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.staticinfo.md) |  | [CopyrightInfo](./harp-mapview.copyrightinfo.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| undefined | Static copyright info.<!-- -->Use when \[\[MapView\]\]'s \[\[DataSource\]\]'s do not provide proper copyright information. |
|  [update](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.update.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Update copyright info text in controlled HTML element. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attach(mapView)](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.attach.md) |  | Attaches this \[\[CopyrightInfo\]\] updates from \[\[MapView\]\] instance. |
|  [destroy()](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.destroy.md) |  | Destroys this object by removing all event listeners from the attached \[\[MapView\]\]s. |
|  [detach(mapView)](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.detach.md) |  | Stop following \[\[CopyrightInfo\]\] updates from \[\[MapView\]\] instance. |
|  [install(element, mapView)](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.install.md) | <code>static</code> | Install \[\[CopyrightElementHandler\]\] on DOM element and - optionally - attach to a \[\[MapView\]\] instance. |
|  [setDefaults(defaults)](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.setdefaults.md) |  | Set \[\[CopyrightInfo\]\] defaults to be used in case \[\[DataSource\]\] does not provide deatailed copyright information.<!-- -->The defaults will applied to all undefined <code>year</code>, <code>label</code> and <code>link</code> values in the copyright information retrieved from \[\[MapView\]\]. |
|  [setStaticCopyightInfo(staticInfo)](./harp-mapview.copyrightelementhandler.setstaticcopyightinfo.md) |  | Sets the \[\[staticInfo\]\] property.<!-- -->A <code>CopyrightElementHandler</code> always displays a deduplicated sum of static copyright info and copyright information obtained from attached \[\[MapView\]\]s.<!-- -->This information is used when \[\[DataSource\]\] instances of given \[\[MapView\]\] do not provide copyright information. |
